alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern Lincoln County; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Harding County; Roosevelt County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 10 at 2:39AM MST until January 11 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, South Central Mountains, Far Northeast Highlands, Harding County, Curry County, Roosevelt County, De Baca County, Eastern Lincoln County, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on north to south oriented roadways.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
